email.title: LEAF STOPPER CONFIRMATION
email.description: Thank you for your Leaf Stopper Enquiry. If you do not receive a call from an installer within 72 hours, please call us on 1300 334 333 or email us at office@leafstopper.com.au

sms.title: LEAF STOPPER CONFIRMATION
sms.description: Thank you for your Leaf Stopper Enquiry. If you do not receive a call from an installer within 72 hours, please call us on 1300 334 333 or email us at office@leafstopper.com.au

email.title: NEW LEAF STOPPER LEAD - ACCEPT or DECLINE
email.message:
Hi [org_name]

We have received a new Leaf Stopper enquiry at [suburb_name]. Please ACCEPT or DECLINE this lead.

If we don’t receive a reply from you within [aod-pending], the lead will lapse and it will be reassigned.

If you accept, your investment if the lead is WON will be $0.00.

Click the button below to ACCEPT or DECLINE this lead.

Suburb: [suburb_name]
Postcode: [postcode]
State: [state]

sms.title: NEW LEAF STOPPER LEAD - ACCEPT Or DECLINE
sms.description: New Leaf Stopper lead from [suburb_name], [postcode], [state]. Click the link to ACCEPT or DECLINE [lead_history_link]

email.title: LEAD WAS ALLOWED TO LAPSE
email.message: This Organisation failed to ACCEPT or DECLINE the lead in time. Their account has been suspended from receiving new leads and they’ve been notified to contact Admin.

notification.title: LEAD WAS ALLOWED TO LAPSE
notification.description: No response. Account has been suspended and this lead may need to be reassigned.

email.title: LEAD WAS ALLOWED TO LAPSE
email.message:
A new lead was sent to you to ACCEPT or DECLINE. Unfortunately, we did not receive a response in time and the lead was allowed to LAPSE. As a result, your account has been SUSPENDED from receiving new leads.

To unsuspend, please contact Admin urgently on 02 8211 0211.

notification.title: LEAD WAS NO RESPONSE

You’ve ACCEPTED this Leaf Stopper lead. Please complete the following steps:

email.title: AWAITING PROGRESS RESPONSE - REMINDER
email.message:
This is an urgent reminder to update the status of this lead. Please complete the following steps:


Step 1 - Contact the enquirer immediately within [cec-awaiting-response-email-sent].

Step 2 - Update the status of this lead using the button below or by signing into your account at www.traleado.com/login

Your account will be suspended from receiving new leads if no action is taken within [cec-awaiting-response-email-sent].

email.title: YOUR LEAD PROGRESS UPDATE HAS BEEN RECEIVED
email.message:
Hi [org_name],

Your PROGRESS response has been received. Please update the lead status within [inprogress-awaiting-response] to advise if this lead has been WON (installed) or LOST. You can extend the time if needed by updating the lead status.

Update the status of this lead using the button below or by signing into your account at www.traleado.com/login
